text: ke tiniharule dekhenan, ki allaha jasale akasaharu ra dhartiko srsti gareko cha, u yasa kurama saksama cha ki tiniharu jasta manisaharu srsti garna sakos? Ra usaile tiniharuko nimti eka yasto samaya nirdharita garidi'eko cha, jasama kunai pani sandeha chaina. Tara atyacariharule inkara nagari rahana saktainan
